content.detailedDescription: Just a normal saturday night when i heard fireworks in the next town over. i looked out my window to see if i could see them and i couldn't because of trees but i noticed a red light possibly 2 hovering over the tree line in my view. i thought it was a reflection of a red light in my room but i double checked and it wasn't a possibility. i watched it for 30 seconds out of my bedroom window while it hovered and i think the 2 became 1. exact distance is hard to judge for me but it wasn't super far away maybe under 1/2 mile looking west towards firework noise but i'm positive it wasn't fireworks. so i left my room and went to my front porch outside and continued to observe it hovering, maybe descending a little and slowly slowly slowly floating to south southwest. it continued that direction and sped up very gradually also it blinked a few times. after estimated 2-3 minutes of actual viewing it just blinked out. it was not a plane or helicopter. there was a helicopter flying east to west around the end of the observation but those are routine couple times a week. i always keep an eye to the sky bc i'm a skeptical believer but this is first time i'm sure ive seen some unexplained flying something. it hovered, blinked, combined (i'm not sure if there was 2 or bc i was looking through a window it appeared to be 2 but i'm 80% sure there was), drifted slowly, then blinked out to summarize.
content.summary: Perplexing but awesome

content.detailedDescription: Been seeing ufo's for a long time, they keep coming back.
content.summary: Small orbs flying very low & close

content.detailedDescription:
1) i was sitting down watching fireworks to the east 
2) than just happened to look towards the ne and seen the light which i observed for a while till it went dim
3) i didn't think it was any thing else but a ufo because of the lights on it and how it hovered
4) the lights on the ufo were a bit odd because at first it was solid red than a few mins after it was starting to just blink different colors like red blue yellow green.
5) i just sat there for a min observing than old my mom next to and which she knew it wasn't any thing like a plane or heli because she's into ufos and things and i also showed my friend which also thought i was a ufo
6) i lost sight of it when it just vanished , went a way , just kinda like if someone was to turn a switch off to a light, instantly off.

in the pictures below that i have provided you with we're not the best but it's what i got from sighting of ufo and if you look closely there is a little spec of light in middle of picture and the first pic the sky was a little bit bluer (lighter) out and in last to i was darker so you can obviously tell the pics were about 10 mins in between and has same object there . the video isn't great either, but you can also make out the little spec of light and that it didn't move.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: At first it was hovering stayed vey still than went up a little than down . left i right nut didn't go far at all just stayed in little area in sky for about 20 mins then the lights on it just turned off

content.detailedDescription:
We noticed something about a few miles out of town next to bear spring mountain ny.
 it was about pea size from where we were and stayed hovering for about three minutes and then dim and light again and dim then disappeared .
  lighting bolts came out of the bottom and side..
content.summary: Glowing red orange for a few minutes and went dim and light then dim then took off ,just disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
We owned an ice cream shop with outside seating in downtown chimney rock, nc. around 10 pm we decided to stay open late since one couple was dancing to the beach music we were playing and two other couples were sitting enjoying the evening. my husband and i joined our customers and were sitting down when a bright yellow/white light darted from the range of mountains across the street and was chased by a military helicopter. 

the chase lasted only a few seconds as the ufo shot across the sky toward the lighted chimney rock (a chimney shaped rock) that was on the opposite side of the road (our side). the two objects soared around the "chimney" and the ufo made a hard right turn with the helicopter on its tail in pursuit.

it was unmistakably a ufo with a miitary helicopter giving a hard chase. both disappeared over the range of mountains that comprise the park. it was a clear night, stars were out, no moon. the only sound was that of the helicopter. the helicopter was right on the tail of the ufo by the time the two reached the "chimney". it was an incredible sight.


i don't know the names of the 2 couples who also witnessed the chase, they were strangers.
content.summary: Ufo chased by helicopter witnessed by 6 people

content.detailedDescription: I want to tell all i can about the flying triangle i certainly observed, but i want to be anonymous and protect the anonymanity of other observers i will refer to.  i was at a community park. about 10 pm thousands of people were there observing a major fireworks display. it was now an hour and a half later but since there were so many fireworks used prior there was a slight haze but clear sky and calm cool air mostly. i observed a person staring up into the sky, the person also got the attention of another person and pointed to something in the sky. i looked into the sky too to see. immediately my attention was caught by a group of lights. the group seemed to be joined and ever slowly moving, like drifting. it was 1000 or more feet up, it was a mile or more to my north. it was a night sky. it was a little confusing, i was trying to get my mind  around what it was that i was seeing. over the course of about the next minute or so i spent concentrating on the group of lights and all the while i was also looking over at the two original guys to see if they were seeing what i was, i was looking around too at other people near me to see if they were noticing. looking back and really studying the object i observed this: it is best described as a geometric outline of lighted or light reflective lines joining whiteish blue lights with a red light someplace too. i could barely make out a 3d quality and that it was a craft. the reason it was difficult to make out was because i was below it but from a distance. i looked upon it from about a 40 degree angle. then it was moving as in drifting to the slight easterly direction, but also slightly moving down in the horizon and the triangle was spinning in the flat but also tilting up too. besides all that, the lights were all coming in and out of brightness, such as building to darker and fading to lighter, i saw the triangle form at first just as a slightly darker sky between the lights in the triangle form, but then as the thing twisted and tilted so i was looking right on from the underneath of the thing the outlines started fading in and out just like the lights were doing. but the lines were dimmer than the lights. once i had seen all the lights on their brightest and the outline lines on their brightest a few times my mind said bingo "that is one of those flying triangle crafts"  "i am actually seeing one of those triangle crafts i have seen on the internet." i said to the person i was with " look a ufo, there. i pointed they looked on and did definitely see it, didn't seem to take it as serious, i said, no, look its a triangle, there see the lines? they did, but didn't seem as impressed as me? i was and still am impressed. i am 100 percent convinced i looked upon a triangle ufo or stealth craft for 2-3 minutes. i watched the thing fade, drift a little more to the east and lower in the horizon until it was just alongside of an outline of a tree that was situated between myself and the thing in the sky? it sort of loitered and faded near the edge of the large tree outline blocking my view, the triangle had dimmed. i hope i communicated that it basically hovered the whole time except drifting and twisting a little. i heard no noise, my environment was loud though? an estimate of size is a guess 60-75 feet long? later on i asked the first onlooker if they  saw it. they said i saw something weird, but don't know if they thought it was a ufo? my opinion it was 100 pct a ufo flying triangle as long as somebody wasn't pulling a hoax.
content.summary: Observed a floating triangle of lights and lighted or at least light reflecting outlines.

content.detailedDescription: Every now and then the military has been having stealth bombers fly on a low level practice bombing run flight path the goes directly over my home about once a month. on this day i went out to take some pictures of the bomber as it flew over my home to show on my social media page. i had taken many pictures that day but on the last pass i took 3 pictures in rapid succession. the time period took about 3 seconds. 1 second per picture on my cell phone. picture 1 had the bomber only in it. picture 2 had something behind the bomber. it looked like a small craft roughly about 1/10th the size of the bomber. it was black in color and there looked to be a white light on the back end which to me suggested a exhaust or flame. picture 3 only had the bomber in it once more. the other craft was gone. 30 seconds later as the bomber turned to the west i heard it go supersonic and it broke the sound barrier. they had never done that before on their practice runs. that was the only time. 3 days later 2 bombers returned and did around 7 or 8 low level flights using my home it seemed as a center point where they would turn and fly off into another direction. each flight run came from different directions that day. they did not fly on their normal practice pattern. i compiled the pictures and have enclosed them. to show my sighting. picture 1 shows the sequence of the pictures and the event. the others are the pictures from my cellphone. i have had 4 more sightings of different craft since but all were too far away for my cell phone to pick them up. one shaped like a missile. all white with small square wings on the tail only. one that was just one light in the night sky that met up with a 2nd which was stationary and i thought was a star till it flew off in another directing meeting up with a third that did the same thing. one that flew directly over my home that have 8 barely visible gray lights in a straight line. not one after the other but side by side. one was a formation that i thought was a flock of birds but they flew in too perfect of a formation and when i looked at them in binoculars i could see they were all v shaped craft. white, gray and black in color. i do have each event documented down in a log book i started.
content.summary: It was as if it just popped in behind the bomber for just a moment then it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in back yard i'm federal hts colorado.Enjoying the day when it began to rain at aprox 552 it began to rain.I looked to the west aprox 45to50 degrees from my horizon aspect i observed a silver object traveling in a straight line for aprox 45sec with what i believe was a slight right hand turn towards heavy cloud bank as it turned it dissapeared.
content.summary: Object was seen during brief but heavy cloud burst.Before camera could be activatedit veered right and accelerated then..Gone

content.detailedDescription:
While driving north on a two land moderate trafficked road, i was watching fireworks displays on either side of the road in the distance, at one point i happened to see 5 orange orbs in a v formation hovering in the western sky. the did not appear to move however i was in a car so it would be difficult to state if they were moving at all. the remained in the same v formation and i became puzzled at the time so i asked my husband to look over and see them. he acknowledged that he saw them as well.
we lost sight of them as we continued to drive north.
this occurred on july 4, 2015 at approx. 9:30 pm
content.summary: Driving north on a moderate traffic road saw 5 orange orbs in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My son came in to my room to ask me to come outside to look at something . i asked him why and he said it was a weird light in the sky . i got up and went outside and he pointed to a large orange red orb in the sky . he said when he turned on our road , coming home he noticed it ' i ran back inside to get my mono scope and came back out . just as i started to focus on it ,it disappeared . when i came back inside i looked at the clock and it was around 2:30 am . i have never seen anything with that color , other than the  sun right before it sits below the horizon . i have no idea what it could have been . my son said it appeared to be moving very slowly , but i didn't notice it moving .It did look as if it dulled and then got brighter , but it could have been the clouds . thank you .
content.summary: My son woke me up to come look at something outside .

content.detailedDescription: The date of this incident was october 8, 2013 at 7:30 am est, i was sitting on my front porch drinking my morning coffee waiting for my wife to get home from work.  i'm not really sure what made me look up but i did, and i saw the 3 fighter jets flying really high, i'm not sure what they were but they looked kinda like f-16"s.  the thing that really got my attention was an oval shape right below the center aircraft, you could see the contrail coming off of the jets but the oval object had none.  then it just disappeared and about 2 or 3 seconds later reappeared in front of the lead jet which totally blew my mind.  approximately one minute after they were out of my field of vision another fighter jet comes along on the same flight path and elevation.  i was very excited as being 54 years old and this is the first sighting i had ever had of what to me had to be a ufo.  i told my wife about it when she got home and she said i should sketch out what i saw and see if i could find someone to talk to about it and the first people i thought of was mufon but apparently i did not get the e-mail address right as i never heard from anyone.  just for the record i am ex-military and a former police officer and i know what i saw.
content.summary: 3 plus fighter jets and one oval shaped ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday july 10, 2015
approximately 9pm, est
johns creek, ga

pulsating, star-like object seen travelling quickly across night sky changes direction and disappears (2 witnesses).  

last night, my 10 year old daughter and i were in the neighborhood pool awaiting the rest of the family.  on this clear summer night, we were gazing into the sky, pointing out stars and were actually watching 2 planes, plus a helicopter fly overhead at different bearings and altitudes.  each was quite typical, with plane-type lights, sounds, and movements.  the helicopter we witnessed, caught far better attention from us because it was lower than the planes (approx 500' high).  we could see the shape, and even opposing red and blue blinking lights, making us think it was a police or law enforcement helipcopter.  it's sound was more muffled that you'd have expected for a helicopter flying as low as it was.  it's shape simply a dark silouhette with no identifiable markings from our distance.

almost immediately after the helicopter flew away, my daughter pointed out an object at a much higher altitude, well off to the northeast.  "dad... what is that?"  we both watched as this object, which looked like any other star in the sky (as far as brightness and intensity goes) moved in a perfectly straight line in a due west direction for about 20 seconds.  it was slightly pulsating, like some stars do, but appeared to move extremely fast given the distance we watched it cover (having just watched 2 planes).  the object was yellow/ white in color, left a very faint trail behind it which disappeared quickly.  the object seemed to cover what looked like 1-2 miles in just 15 seconds or so.  my reply to her was, "hon, i have no idea what we're looking at here."  

we watched closely together for the next 5-10 seconds - talking amongst ourselves about it.  this object moved at great speed in a perfetly straight line across the sky, then suddenly changed its flight direction while we were talking about it.  the change was instant and abrupt, moving a full 45-degrees to the north from how it had been flying, looking like it was almost flying straight up because it disappeared about 3 seconds later an an even greater speed, just vanishing before us.

the entire sighting lasted about 30 seconds and my daughter is still talking about this today to me and her friends.  this was definitely one of the odder things we've ever seen together in the skies.
content.summary: Very fast moving, star-like object witnessed with 10-year old daughter moved across sky, then change direction and disppeared

content.detailedDescription: I was walking at night in richmond, ky, and out of nowhere an oval shaped object slowly just hovered above me, maybe 150 feet above me (at most) and 50 feet from me. i had no idea what it was, or what i should do, or who i would have told. it had many lights on it, they weren't that bright, like they didn't want to be seen. i wanted to take a picture of it after watching it for a minute or two and as soon as i pulled my camera out it flew off, faster and quieter than i have ever seen or heard any air craft before.
content.summary: I walk on a late night walk and it appeared out of nowhere and hovered above me for a couple of minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was looking south/southwest (towards colorado springs) out my guest bedroom window as we were experiencing an intense cloud to cloud lightening storm and it was quite beautiful. this was at about 8:45 p.M. the clouds were black when i suddenly spotted in the center of the cloud, what i at first thought was the international space station...This object was just sitting there, stationary; blue, red white lights (mostly blue) blinking like the space station. but i believe the space station is in the northwestern sky? i grabbed my binoculars and watched the object for a good 15 minutes and was amazed by what it was doing...The entire time the lights would pulsate and change color and intensity...With the blue being the predominant color. it would suddenly "fly" vertically...Stop and fly horizontally...Stop and suddenly "fall" from the sky...Only to go straight back up and hover! the elevation was at my eye level...When it dropped, my view was obstructed by houses in the distance. as the crow flies...It was probably at least 10-15 miles away. i live near a string of power lines that run north/south. the object was absolutely flying in such a way that defies astrophysics-i hope that's the right word. imagine the space station flying in such a way, and you will have a pretty good idea as to what the object "looked" like - but again, i was in such awe over its maneuvers that i felt compelled, for the first time in my life, to actually "report" a ufo sighting hoping that someone else in the area was witness to the same thing! i am still utterly amazed! as i watched the object, i couldn't help but to keep saying aloud (to myself) wtf...This can't be happening! holy s___! this is too unbelievable! i was so wishing that someone was home with me to witness it!! i am hoping that you have received other reports about this same sighting. i hope that this helps you. thank you very much. ps although i am surrounded by major airports, i did not witness any airplanes/helicopters in the sky the entire time i was watching the ufo.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Blinking, red, white, mostly blue, stationary, then quickly vertical, then horizontal flight pattern...Stayed in same area for apx. 35 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
I took my dog outside to pee before going to bed. a light, moving south, passed over my right. it got my attention cause i thought it was a satellite. but, not at 11:30pm. it couldn't be an airplane, it was just s bright light. no market lights. i'm here in palmdale, ca. i see a lot of military planes. this was not one of ours, or anything from earth! so it passed overhead and then quickly climbed. it looked like it was heading to space. then it looped, real right loop. 180 degrees. straight down. then the light began tracing a path similar to a roller coaster. up, down, left, right, wild ride! lindy of what a stunt plane would do. but much faster and changed directions like no plane could. it dove down behind the mountains and i lost sight of it.  i waited, didn't see it again. 
i was so excited and pissed. i didn't have my phone on me. couldn't take a picture. i wanted to run inside and get it and my skepticial wife. but i figured it would be gone when i came out. i'd rather watch and not miss the experience. it was so cool to realize, i was looking at a ufo!
content.summary: I first saw what i thought was a satellite, but it was to late at night. 11:30pm. it headed south, straight and then went up. it did a tight loop back down. it then just flew around in all directions kind of like it was on s roller coaster. and it was fas

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a bus heading from florence to pisa airport.
while staying in tuscany two days before i heard military jets flying overhead very low and circling the area for over an hour.  i made a joke that they are chasing a ufo because they were interrupting our class.  when i was on the bus, traveling westward, my seat was facing west.  i don't know what made me look to the other side, i just decided to look.  the first thing i saw was an object materializing over the mountain range as if out of nothing it then grew in size while simultaneously descending and approaching to hover below the line of the mountain range. i thought maybe it was a helicopter but then in rapid succession 3 more craft perfectly spaced apart from the first object repeated its motion appearing above the mountain and then descending and approaching slightly very quickly and in a perfect curve until all four were hovering just below the mountain range on the horizon.  this captivated my attention and i knew this was something special because the objects were in a perfect straight line perfectly spaced apart, they looked out of place.  

the people on the bus looked at me and looked out onto the mountain.  i wanted to shout at them to look!  but i didn't want to scare anyone.  unfortunately i broke my phone earlier that week-end and could not take photographs so i just looked as if my life depended on it.  i was on a moving bus going away from the mountain range but i could see the first object begin to fade and get smaller compared to the other 3 still hovering in the same spot when i could no longer see the formation.  i have been asking to see a ufo mentally for a long time and it felt like they did it just for me.
content.summary: A formation of 4 black spherical ufo over mountain range ne of vinci, italy.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from rolla, mo to columbia, mo. i forgot what road/highway i was on at the time. when i looked at the photos later i noticed lights in the upper-right hand corner of one of them. i then looked at the rest and found two other photos with the lights in the same location. one of the photos was taken more than a minute after the first. the cloud positions had shifted but the lights still seemed the same distance away and in the same formation as the the photo taken a minute earlier. i put an overlay of the  last photo (taken at 12:36pm) in photoshop over the first (taken at 12:35pm) to measure the distance between the lights on the outline of the object. it seemed higher than the clouds in the photo. also, during the ride, i blacked out and came to heading into oncoming traffic. i straightened the car back out, called a friend, and had him talk to me while i drove the rest of the trip. i did not witness the event beyond being there while i took the photos. i noticed the object in the sky while viewing the photos. when i first noticed the object in the photos i thought it was the flash on my camera. i tried to recreate the flash in photos and examined the shapes of the flash bulb casing (kodak easyshare m530 is the model number) but couldn't explain the lights and colored light down and to the left of them. you can see the lights in the-upper-right hand corner of the photos, which are digital copies of the original, with only date metadata changed (last opened, altered or what not), not image data as far as i'm aware.
content.summary: I took photos with my camera of clouds and found the lights and outline later.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home when i looked up in the sky and saw a ufo about 1000ft in the sky. it was following me. when i first saw the ufo i knew it wasn't something normal. the flight patterns were anything we are capable of today. my husband was in the military and he taught me about military aircraft and ground vehicles. this ufo was something else. when i turned into my subdivision on base the object started descending until it was right on top of my car.I just stopped right there. i couldn't make out the ufo fully but it gave off the the brightest light. my car had stopped and i was frozen. what i remember next i being extremely scared. i raced home. when i was in my drive way i was scared that "they" were coming for me. but i made a dash for the house and once inside i locked the door and told my husband about it.
content.summary: Military instalation - ufo following me

content.detailedDescription: I took my dog out in my backyard.  she went down on the lawn to do her business, i remained on the deck.  i saw the lights immediately. there were 4 or 5 of them, not sure because of the tree line.  these orange orbs travelled at the same steady speed in formation. i couldn't tell if they were separate objects or lights on a larger object.  the distance between them did not change. they were completely silent.  i consciously tried to hear a "aircraft" noise but there was none.  there were no blinking lights like on airplanes and the color was also not typical of red lights on a plane.  they appeared huge to my eye.  one light in the most western position "blinked out", meaning it was there and then it wasn't.  the bright orange globes continued on a steady south easterly direcction until they disappeared behind the trees.  i was too frightened to go to the front yard to follow their path to see where they went. i really tried to de-bunk what i was seeing while it was happening; consciously looking for anything that would indicate they were airplanes, but there wasn't anything about them that would fit.  i also thought of the possibility of floating lanterns but their position to each other didn't change, they remained the same distance apart.  they were all the same size and shape, all the same oolor of bright orange which didn't flicker, pulsate or flash, just a steady light.  the dog took no notice, i was scared to death and shook and cried for a while once i went back  inside the house.
content.summary: 5 large orange balls of light traveling across the sky, one "blinked" out or "faded"

content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking for the iss to go over (coffs harbour, nsw). facing wrong way (east) and suddenly a triangle shaped 'craft' appeared over the top of my house, back a bit. came from behind trees. i was attracted by the three pulsating lights at first. could see they were in a triangle shape. i didn't know what to make of it. never seen anything like it, nor pictures at that time. lights were red (top of triangle), yellowy green and then white. very bright and flashed sequentially. it hovered for about 5 seconds, then shot off south for a little way (about 2 secs) then banked east towards the airport (near the ocean) and disappeared. i felt that was because the lights were now facing away from me. it moved vertically, not horizontally during the time i saw it. there was no sound at all. all i could hear was the highway very, very faintly but no sound from whatever it was in the sky.  was not a plane nor a helicopter nor a drone (unless deathly silent) but did not look like a drone. it was exciting to see it. my son (on the balcony of the house and unable to see it) could hear me describing what i saw. i was at the top of my driveway on a hill. it has been 'playing' on my mind for the past 4 days and i still feel a very strong sense of elation and excitement. the colour looked as though it was black with grey edges. it was a definite triangle. (see pic).
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Appeared back of my house. hovered a few seconds. took off quite fast, banked east. disappeared. vertical 'craft' view

content.detailedDescription:
July 4th evening. starting 8pm ish southeast to northwest of what first appeared to be helicopters. 2 to 5 at a time these lights were in the sky from 8pm to 12pm and beyond. out of ordinary no# of flights in odd direction but strange was silence. in fireworks lull was obvious craft were totally silent. visually obvious helicopters but silence was odd. what cinched the wtf category was dark square object flying same path, keeping pace, no exterior lights. looked like city blocked lifted up to 50degrees flying 150-200mph. no film no pictures. what's the point. photographic evidence has been irrelevant. people will or won't believe. 

bs perspective: odd govt overflight of joplin july 4th. many 20-50 helicopter like objects flying se to nw from 8pm to 12pm. estimate 20 - 50 craft. totally silent. 1 odd city block size object same flight path silence also. 

no agenda no baloney just sayin...!!!!
content.summary: Se to nw overflight of objects-probably military 1 unknown fast blimp gray no lights

content.detailedDescription: When i was about 3 or 4yrs old, i remember going to the "dr's office".   3 or 4 doctors  dressed from  head to toe in white surgical scrubs, faces masked and, you can only see their eyes. they tell me i'm there for a vaccination. i remember one of them saying don't worry it looks like a pig, showing me the tip of a gun that had like a tube dropping off the barrel. the tip was round with     another ring in the center.  on the out side two needles and the center had to needles hence the pig. i judge they searched my child mind to see what i would except as familiar . i was put in a chair and remember wondering where my mom was. also confused that the dr's are only a little bit bigger then me and i knew i was little. the scar on my left arm i always thought was a booster shot. when i asked my mom about it she said i had no such vaccine. when i started meeting people with the booster scar i realized my scar is to low on my arm, its texture is a little different and i was allways about 5 yrs younger then them. my mom couldn't identifie the scar. i believe it is a tracker. there is more stories over the years but want to wait to tell the rest,see if moufn decides to investigate. i've never told the story due to me testing the waters when i tried. i would tell parts of story and was never believed. i don't think on it all the time but when i do i'm driven to know if there is anything in my arm. but i can't go tell my docter this story and ask for a x-ray. so i don't know for sure. i also am open to fauls memories as a possible solution, but the strange scar? other miner contacts, and strange events ( that could be mere coincidence i'm reading more in to ) have me confused. i'm a 41 yr old cps social worker.  help?  i also want mention that i easily and often but not controlled have out of body experience. i don't know if its related.
content.summary: Not ufo, alien contact.

content.detailedDescription: When i was about 3 or 4yrs old, i remember going to the "dr's office".   3 or 4 doctors  dressed from  head to toe in white surgical scrubs, faces masked and, you can only see their eyes. they tell me i'm there for a vaccination. i remember one of them saying don't worry it looks like a pig, showing me the tip of a gun that had like a tube dropping off the barrel. the tip was round with     another ring in the center.  on the out side two needles and the center had to needles hence the pig. i judge they searched my child mind to see what i would except as familiar . i was put in a chair and remember wondering where my mom was. also confused that the dr's are only a little bit bigger then me and i knew i was little. the scar on my left arm i always thought was a booster shot. when i asked my mom about it she said i had no such vaccine. when i started meeting people with the booster scar i realized my scar is to low on my arm, its texture is a little different and i was allways about 5 yrs younger then them. my mom couldn't identifie the scar. i believe it is a tracker. there is more stories over the years but want to wait to tell the rest,see if moufn decides to investigate. i've never told the story due to me testing the waters when i tried. i would tell parts of story and was never believed. i don't think on it all the time but when i do i'm driven to know if there is anything in my arm. but i can't go tell my docter this story and ask for a x-ray. so i don't know for sure. i also am open to fauls memories as a possible solution, but the strange scar? other miner contacts, and strange events ( that could be mere coincidence i'm reading more in to ) have me confused. i'm a 41 yr old cps social worker.  help?  i also want mention that i easily and often but not controlled have out of body experience. i don't know if its related.
content.summary: Not ufo, alien contact.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 8:05 pm on wednesday, july 7, 2015 while at a baseball game a southwest airline plane flew over the stadium heading due west. we call it the swa flyover. a bright light caught my attention just left of the swa plane, glowing very brightly and appeared to be coming toward the ballpark. the light was very "star" like in brightness and appeared out of place. as the swa plane continued west the light became brighter and looked like it was coming closer. i pointed my binoculars at the light and expected to see a helicopter or plane with landing lights but instead saw only a bright light with no contrail, such as we see when a jet is going by. i motioned to my friend that he should look at the light and he too put his binocular on it and said "what is that?". i said i didn't know. our attention returned to the game but then a minute later we noticed the light getting closer. what i saw was a very brightly reflective object that was in the shape of a sideways tear drop, more like a very bright kidney bean shape. through the binocular i could see what appeared to be white "windows", kind of misty or unfocused shimmering in the middle of the object. it appeared to hover then in a blink started to ascend back towards the se or to my 10 o'clock setting as i saw it and was gone in nothing flat. i have a vivid recollection of the shape and the brightness and how quickly it came and went. as i think about the shape it resembled the pictures i've seen of the shinny art piece in chicago that looks like chrome. i and my other witness both agreed that we saw something, that it appeared and disappeared quickly and are both sort of wanting it to appear again. it has not. others may have seen the light but they did not have binoculars like the two of us did, but there is no one who doesn't think we witnessed a very unusual object that came and left. 
i have had a "happy" feeling about the sighting, whatever that means. i actually feel special in some sort of funny way that i am a witness to whatever it was.  i don't know why i feel this way but there is absolutely no fear from seeing it. i can sketch what i saw because it's very real to me.
content.summary: The light turned into an object through my binoculars

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to my truck at 4:38am cmt july 10 2015 this object? stopped and reversed  itself toward me at a quick speed which made me retreat as i felt it was coming to me it went from a small light to a larger light as it came closer to me so i felt i needed to retreat into my home it acted as if it saw me and was approaching me when i moved quickly back onto my front porch  it stopped then took off again southwest it moved so quickly then vanished
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Stepped outside to my truck just happened to look up thought it was a satellite as it tracked away it stopped then it came toward me and got bigger and brighter which made me feel it was approaching me and my domocile it also changed direction

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside on my porch. i saw at first a bright red light moving from the ne heading in my direction. at first it seemed like a light from a plane and i didn't think anything of it since my house is in the path of the airport. however, as it got closer it grew in size. the closer it got the more elongated it's shape became. it went from red to a orange/red glow.   i stood up to listen for noise and watch it closer. i kept adjusting my glasses to make sure of what i was seeing. it moved sw quickly without sound. it went too fast to get a picture or a video of it on my phone. 

i was messaging a friend on fb and told her about it. i didn't believe my eyes at first. i still don't believe it. my friend referred me here to report. it moved so fast. i lost sight when i looked away for a moment.
content.summary: Reddish orange glow, cylindrical but vertically, no noise.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
We were leaving louiseville on st-laurent street at about 8 pm when me and my wife got our eyes attention over the roof top window.
a big black object with many orange lights on corners was hovering above the car moving in the same east direction but faster than us. when the object was about 200 feets from the car it seem to be 100 feet up in the air with no sound. the shape was diamond shape the longest dimension in the same direction of the movement east. we try to follow the object but it was to fast. we stop at a little gas station 2 km from the first eye contact. we go out of the car the object seem to be 1 km further east with absolutly no sound at all. we watch the object continue for another km then stop, pivoting counter clockwise 45 degrees and the moving north slowly and the dissapear in the horizon.
we were shocked of that strange encounter so we have not talk about this to anyone for few years before telling our family. when i saw some ufo documentary on triangular black shape it give me some shiverings because its like two triangular ufo glued together.
22 years have passed i hope it can help you any way.
jp lefebvre.
content.summary: Ufo just pass over the car roof top window continue for about 3 km stop pivoting then goes north then dissapear.

content.detailedDescription: I was returning home from the grocery store that was less then a mile from my home. i was driving on waughtown st towards kernersville and it was almost 9pm and no one was visibly on the road with me. i saw just over the tree tops a bright white/blue light it came into view over the trees. i knoticed it because the sky was dark blue and starting to become night. the light shot sharply to the left and at that time i was listening to a cd which then went to static, my digital clock in the car blinked and it lasted 10-15 seconds and then everything went back to normal after the light moved very quickly right and up going past some trees and out of sight. my reaction was to speed up and get home i was shaking and i felt like i was tingling all over.
content.summary: Bright light fast changing direction cd cut to static and back after 10-15 sec.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting at intersection at hwy 7 in tysons corner, va in 1991. the red light took about 7 minutes long. across the intersection was a hugh disk shaped object the size of a football field just hovering above the tree line. i looked around and none of the other drivers were reacting. i remembered thinking it wasn't a blimp and couldn't understand why others were not reacting. across the street were apartments/town homes and houses and behind that a golf course. when the light changed and i crossed the street, it disappeared. years later i looked out my back window at night after a thunderstorm, and there were about 70 white globe lights around my tree. they blinked like fireflies and i watched them for 30 minutes. i looked on the internet and it described ball lightening. very strange.
content.summary: Craft hovered over tree line

content.detailedDescription:
I was asked by an unknown person to join a party at 9:pm i had ah couple
of drinks a man aproched me near 11:pm and asked me to leave thier . so
i started walking through the dark road to town 50 yards before town this
viacle from the east behind me at 100 yards was noiseless with speed of
55 mph it was coming at me fast .30 yards from town in a fraction of an
seconds at 12:25am i awoken 2 miles away walking through north side of town .
i looked at my watch it read aproximatly 5:21am .
content.summary: Walked3milesfromfiargrounds30yardsbeforetownthisviaclewasfloating1ft.50yardstheniawokeintown.
